title: copy_files_to_archive Lambda Input['Records']['body']
description: A dict created by converting a string.

jobId.description: The unique id of the recovery job.

granuleId.description: The unique ID of the granule.

filename.description: The name of the file being copied.

sourceKey.description: The path the file was restored to.

targetKey.description: The path to copy to. Defaults to value at 'source_key'.

restoreDestination.description: The name of the bucket the restored file will be moved to.

sourceBucket.description: Set by moveGranules. The bucket the restored file can be copied from.
